results.name: Wings
results.description: Wings is a decentralized application built on Ethe
results.fullDescription: Wings is a decentralized application built on Ethereum blockchain and IPFS that seeds and nurtures a community dedicated to the launching, backing and promotion of new projects proposals through a fluid organizational model referred to as a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO). Combines several concepts, ranging from attention rewards, forecasting markets, smart contracts, governance models and federated funds security. The platform places an emphasis on encouraging the Wings community to identify and promote high-value proposals that have higher chances of positive financial returns. Wings creates a decentralized forecasting ecosystem that gives tangible incentives for WINGS token holders to put the effort in making the best available choices to maximize their rewards.

results.name: LandSecrets
results.description: LandSecrets is a blockchain smart contract based p
results.fullDescription: LandSecrets is a blockchain smart contract based predicted mining game. You can buy one or more land(s) combined with future Ethereum height using token, and waits for the miner to dig at this block height. If a your land is mined successfully, you will get the reward tokens in your wallet. LandSecrets is based on Ethereum blockchain. Each land you bought has a secret number and mining height, all of which are recorded in blockchain via smart contract. If a miner, at this height, submits a block whose hash prefix matches your land secret number, then your land is determined mining successfully. LandSecrets built upon smart contract is open and impartial, scam and fraud are impossible. More information, please go to https://landsecrets.io.

results.fullDescription: MonitorChain is an on-chain Ethereum smart contract subscription feed tied to security alert detecting block explorer node, designed for use as an oracle by cryptocurrency exchanges and token smart contracts. Ethereum blockchain activity is recorded and analyzed in real time by a combination of encoded rules and heuristics to detect suspicious activity that indicates the presence of potential fraud.

results.name: MUSystem
results.description: ETH Benefit-Society
results.fullDescription:
THE PRINCIPLE OF MUTUAL TRUST IS HIGHER THAN THE PRINCIPLE OF MUTUAL OBLIGATIONS!

Welcome to the MUSystem!

MUSystem works in the Ethereum blockchain since june 2018. The system's algorithm was described by Vyacheslav Mavrodi in his appeal published after his brother, the great genius Sergey Mavrodi, passed away.

? ? The amount of your Savings will be increased by approx 10% after closure of the Second package of your participation and will continue increasing by approx 43% after closure of Each Subsequent package!

✅ ? 60% of your deposit amount will be sent back to your wallet, hold it in your own wallet!

✅ ? Gifts for Deposit and Withdrawal!

? Guaranteed refund at least 70% of the initial deposit in any case and regardless of the duration of your participation!

HOW IT WORKS?
1. You save your deposit. Then just lie on your couch and watch how an amount of your Savings grows in value in each new time interval (Pack). If you are a new participant, then 60% of your initial amount is immediately returned to the balance of your wallet! In addition, the System compensates a part of the transaction fee!

The amount of your savings will be increased by approximately 10% after closure of the second pack of your participation and will continue increasing by approximately 43% after closure of each subsequent pack. The more participants in the System and the greater the amount of their savings — the faster the System moves on to the following packs.

2. You make a withdrawal. Do you want to withdraw your savings in full or in part? No problem! At any time and without any restrictions! You are always able to withdraw 70-100% of your initial savings amount. But, if you decided to wait a little, you can multiply your amount by 2, 5, 10...! Each participant is guaranteed to return 70-100% of the initial amount.

results.name: blockwar
results.description: The fox and the owl play the box game together, an
results.fullDescription: The fox and the owl play the box game together, and the one who folds the highest one will win before the game is over. But the higher the block, the easier it is to increase the risk of collapse. When the number of layers reaches the upper limit, the box collapses, and if the box is block, the other side wins and the game ends. 狐狸和猫头鹰在一起玩叠方块游戏，游戏结束前谁叠得最高谁将获胜。但是方块叠得越高越容易增加倒塌的风险，层数达到上限后方块倒塌，方块如果被叠倒则另一方阵营获胜，游戏结束。

results.name: Ethlance
results.description: Ethlance is a freelancing marketplace that allows
results.fullDescription: Ethlance is a freelancing marketplace that allows users to create an employer/employee profile, list and apply for open positions, rank and provide feedback for employers/employees, and to send/receive invoices. Ethlance is decentralized and does not charge any service fees, and users pay only the necessary cost of gas to broadcast their profiles, posts, messages, feedback, and invoices to the Ethereum network. Ethlance is part of the district0x network and is the first district (marketplace) to be deployed. It was the initial inspiration for the overall network of community marketplaces.

results.name: Crypto Barons
results.description: Join players around the world in this epic batt
results.fullDescription: Join players around the world in this epic battle to become the ultimate Baron. Train your warriors, horse men and even use voodoo wizards to vanquish your enemies and rise to become the ultimate Baron. CryptoBarons is a Cross Platform multiplayer strategy/role playing game. Players can buy game assets and resources such as workers, armies, gold mines, farms etc., build your kingdom, mine gold and train armies. Battle with other kingdoms and get amazing treasures such as magic potions and gain some of their resources. Lose battles and you'll pay a price to resurrect your fallen armies. The main catch here is that players can get earn crypto playing this game, purchase sales of games assets, or receiving commission on transactions. PLEASE NOTE! CryptoBarons is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money which can either be credit card, or BRN Tokens. If you do not want to use this feature, it is not a problem, just download the game and enjoy. You must be at least 13 years of age to play or download CryptoBarons. A network connection is also required. The game assets and resources are ERC721(non-fungible) tokens while the in-game currency is ERC20 (fungible token). Ever wondered what makes CryptoBarons stand out? * Make money by trading loot assets on third party marketplace or the game marketplace for fiat or Cryptocurrencies *It is among the first 3-D strategy blockchain game *It will run on cross platform, web, Pc and phones * It is among the first blockchain game that does not need Metamask or any interface to the blockchain. * You have your wallet private keys and take full care of your funds. * You can use both Cryptocurrency and fiat to buy assets *CryptoBarons will be the first game you might learn about Africa culture *CryptoBarons is the Black Panther of Gaming.
